content.brief: This bill aims to improve cybersecurity in the United States through enhanced sharing of information about cybersecurity threats, and for other purposes. The Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act of 2015 requires the Director of National Intelligence and the Departments of Homeland Security, Defense, and Justice to develop procedures to share cybersecurity threat information with private entities, nonfederal government agencies, state, tribal, and local governments, the public, and entities under threats.
